Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2009 06:12PM kaunderw wrote: Hi Rusty, I don't post much but still lurk since these ladies were so helpful to me when my Mom was diagnosed with brain mets.  She was on decadron to reduce the swelling in her brain.  This lead to significant muscle weakness in her legs, especially thigh muscles.  Stairs and getting up from a seated position were so difficult for her.  Her onc said it was a side effect of the decadron.  Maybe this is going on with you, too.  You'll be in my prayers. Kathy
Posts.Title: KIND OF FREAKED OUT HERE!!!! rooni LuAnnH
